pullrequest.title: Workaround for NFS sync bug affecting many clusters

content.raw: Looks great to me -- only thought, maybe we could make the option name more descriptive of the action, something like "FILEHANDLER_TOUCH_TMPFILE" or "FILEHANDLER_REFRESH_FILESYSTEM", then in the config comments we can explain how it may be useful to avoid NFS caching issues?
